for the model that you train and it's used both in training and in inference
so it becomes part of the saved model that you emit from trainer what that
does is it avoids the problem that we call training serving skew where you're
trying to do feature engineering for data coming in and in training and try to do the same thing in serving and they
could be lately different environments maybe in different languages and you're hoping that you're doing the same thing in both
places this just avoids that problem it puts it in the graph as part of the save model
so you're doing exactly the same thing and you're only coding it once in both places trainer does exactly what it
